about_the_game:
Deepen your Steel Division 2 experience with this free Reinforcement Pack, introducing the Auto Deployment mechanic for the turn-based strategic Army General mode.

The Auto Deployment significantly speeds up your deployment phase during a tactical battle, removing repetition, with the computer placing your units and defensive structures automatically. You can modify a unit’s location as you see fit, reposition bunkers or let the AI finish your deployment for you.

The new mechanic uses the same algorithms a computer-controlled player uses in placing its units on the battlefield.

The Auto Deployment mechanic comes as part of a free Reinforcement Pack, available to all owners of Steel Division 2.
